page.title: 05SANDY GLADE CARAVAN SITE
page.content: ONE OF THE LONGEST ESTABLISHED CARAVAN SITES ALONG THE COAST ROAD THIS SITE CATERS FOR THE FAMILY WHO WISH TO HAVE STATIC CARAVAN,FAMILIES TOURING WITH CARAVANS AND FAMILIES WHO ENJOY TENTING. IT IS SITUATED ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF BERROW CLOSE TO THE BEACH,CHURCH,GOLF COURSE AND BUS ROUTES. THE SITE HAS A LARGE HEATED SWIMMING POOL AND A PADDLERS POOL,IDEAL FOR HOLIDAY PEOPLE WHEN THE TIDE IS OUT. SHOPS CATER FOR ALL FAMILY NEEDS SUN OIL TO SPADES,BREAD TO BARBAQUE NEEDS.AN LEISURE CENTRE PROVIDES EVENING ACTIVITIES AND ENTERTAINMENT. THE FAMILY WHO OWN THE SITE,SET OUT TO PROVIDE VISITORS WITH A HAPPY HOLIDAY.
